pos_mean_info_list.mean: 损害（damage的过去式和过去分词）

bilingual.source: The farmer worried about the frost damaging his crops.
bilingual.target: 农民担心霜会损害他的庄稼。

bilingual.source: Farmers often worry about the zonda damaging their crops.
bilingual.target: 农民们经常担心佐达风会损害他们的庄稼。

bilingual.source: Here are a few career-damaging statements to avoid.
bilingual.target: 下面有些可能对职业造成损害的话语要记得避免。

bilingual.source: With this generation, too, conditional parenting proved damaging.
bilingual.target: 就这一代人来看，有条件的父母之爱同样对他们的身心造成了损害。

bilingual.source: Recoverable pecuniary damage is a diminution of the victim ' s patrimony caused by the damaging event.
bilingual.target: 可回复的财产损害指受害人在损害事件中遭受的财物的减少.

bilingual.source: Isn't that kind of behavior as damaging to a marriage as cheating is?
bilingual.target: 这样的行为不比欺骗更损害婚姻吗？

bilingual.source: The excessive and compulsive use of drugs to the point of damaging one ' s health.
bilingual.target: 强迫性过量使用毒品,以致损害身体.

bilingual.source: Any interference with homeostasis is likely to be damaging to the organism.
bilingual.target: 译:对体内平衡的任何干扰都有可能损害机体.

bilingual.source: Aspirin has the side effect of damaging stomach lining but panadol will not.
bilingual.target: 阿士匹灵的副作用是会损害胃壁，但必理痛不会。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 造成破坏的; 有害的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 损害的；诽谤的；有破坏性的；有害的

word_family.mean: n. 损坏；损伤；伤害；损害赔偿金；损害

sense_info_list.zh: 造成破坏的; 有害的

examination_example.sentence: While seemingly innocent, this loss of mental focus can potentially have a <highlight>damaging</highlight> impact on our professional, social, and personal well-being.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然看似无辜，但这种精神专注的缺失可能会对我们的职业、社交和个人健康产生潜在的破坏性影响。
